sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <record_update table="v_plugin"> <v_plugin action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <active>inactive</active> <available_version>1.0.0</available_version> <definition><![CDATA[<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <plugin id="com.snc.project_portfolio_suite" name="Project Portfolio Suite" version="1.0.0" provider_name="ServiceNow" state="published" type="application" help="Project_Portfolio_Suite" onload_demo_data="load_pps_demo_data.js" licensable="true"> <description>The Project Portfolio Suite (PPS) plugin activates an integrated set of applications for project portfolio management and IT software development. Only upgrade is allowed for this plugin. Activation should be done through Project Portfolio Suite with Financials plugin.</description> <requires> <import plugin="com.snc.project_management_v3"/> <import plugin="com.snc.demand_management"/> <import plugin="com.snc.resource_management"/> <import plugin="com.snc.sdlc.scrum.pp"/> <import plugin="com.snc.test_mgmt"/> <import plugin="com.snc.sdlc.scrum.ppm_int"/> <import plugin="com.snc.test_mgmt.ppm_int"/> <import plugin="com.snc.program_management"/> </requires> <no_activate>true</no_activate> </plugin>]]></definition> <description>The Project Portfolio Suite (PPS) plugin activates an integrated set of applications for project portfolio management and IT software development. Only upgrade is allowed for this plugin. Activation should be done through Project Portfolio Suite with Financials plugin.</description> <has_demo_data>true</has_demo_data> <help>http://docs.servicenow.com/?context=Project_Portfolio_Suite</help> <id>com.snc.project_portfolio_suite</id> <licensable>true</licensable> <name>Project Portfolio Suite</name> <path>plugin://com.snc.project_portfolio_suite/</path> <provider>ServiceNow</provider> <requires>com.snc.project_management_v3,com.snc.demand_management,com.snc.resource_management,com.snc.sdlc.scrum.pp,com.snc.test_mgmt,com.snc.sdlc.scrum.ppm_int,com.snc.test_mgmt.ppm_int,com.snc.program_management</requires> <scope>global</scope> <state>published</state> <supports_rollback>false</supports_rollback> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2017-12-05 06:05:22</sys_created_on> <sys_id>com.snc.project_portfolio_suite</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2017-12-05 06:05:22</sys_updated_on> <trackable>true</trackable> <type>application</type> <version>1.0.0</version> </v_plugin> </record_update>
